title: Leek and hazelnut risotto
ingredients: ['850ml hot meat or vegetable stock', '2 baby carrots', '2 to 3 small leeks', '1 knob of butter', '1 rosemary sprig', '225ml dry white wine', '400g Carnaroli, Arborio or Vialone Nano rice', '1 teaspoon salt (or less if the stock is already salty)', '1 handful of hazelnuts, roughly chopped with a grinder', '1 knob of butter', 'grated Parmesan cheese, to serve']
